meanings.definition: A hardy cabbage of a variety that produces erect stems with large leaves.

meanings.sent2: I enjoy adding kale to my salads for extra nutrients.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cabbage refuse to play hide-and-seek? Because it was always a terrible kale!
meanings.sent4: Her determination stood tall like the sturdy stems of kale.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of kale brightened up the entire dish.
